query:
SELECT 
  c.id as course_id,
  c.title as course_title,
  COUNT(DISTINCT t.id) as topic_count,
  COUNT(q.id) as question_count
FROM courses c
LEFT JOIN topics t ON c.id = t.courseId
LEFT JOIN questions q ON c.id = q.courseId
GROUP BY c.id, c.title
ORDER BY c.id;
